description:
As a user of Shopline
  I want to check the permission status in  bulk update custom filtering conditions after change the staff permission
name: Check the staff permission of bulk update custom filtering conditions

elements.name: Check the bulk update custom filtering conditions

steps.name: I am on Admin Login Page
I fill correct account email to email field
I fill correct account password to password field
I click on login button
I should see successful login
I check intercom message notification frame and click clear intercom message button
I check intercom message notification frame and click intercom message close button
I check new feature alert notification frame and click new feature alert close button
I check and click exclude products panel close button
I check and click no thanks button
I am on Staff Setting Add Page
I fill qa email to email field
I click on add button
I should be redirected to Edit Staff Permissions Page
I click on products and categories label included 'Add/Edit'
2nd products and categories checkbox should be checked
3rd products and categories checkbox should be checked
I scroll down to update button
I click on update button
I should be redirected to Staff Setting Page
I select Logout of User Menu
I should be redirected to Admin Login Page
I fill qa email to email field
I fill qa password to password field
I click on login button
I should see successful login
I am on Category Shop Filter Page
I should see add custom filter button
I select Logout of User Menu
I should be redirected to Admin Login Page
I fill correct account email to email field
I fill correct account password to password field
I click on login button
I should see successful login
I am on Staff Setting Page
I click on edit button
I should be redirected to Edit Staff Permissions Page
I click on products and categories label included 'Add/Edit'
I click on update button
I should be redirected to Staff Setting Page
I select Logout of User Menu
I should be redirected to Admin Login Page
I fill qa email to email field
I fill qa password to password field
I click on login button
I should see successful login
I should be redirected to Unauthorized Page
I click on side menu items included 'Products & Categories'

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["test shop\nTaiwan","Dashboard","Order Management","Products & Categories","Inventory Management","Customer Management","Social Commerce","Promotions & Reward","Report & Analytics","Apps","Online Store Design","Retail Store","Channel Integration","Marketing & Tracker","Settings"],"text":"Products & Categories"}

steps.name: I click on side submenu items included 'Categories'
I should be redirected to Category List Page
I click on online shop filter button
I should be redirected to Unauthorized Page
---ROLL BACK---
I select Logout of User Menu
I should be redirected to Admin Login Page
I fill correct account email to email field
I fill correct account password to password field
I click on login button
I should see successful login
I am on Staff Setting Page
I click on edit button
I should be redirected to Edit Staff Permissions Page
I click on products and categories label included 'View'
I click on update button
I should be redirected to Staff Setting Page
I click on delete button
I should see alert
I click on alert checkbox
I click on ok button
